item.title: Rosenberg: Russia brushes off Trump's claim of 'paper tiger' in aimless war
item.description: The BBC's Steve Rosenberg says far from being riled by Trump's comments, Russia's response has so far been restrained.

item.title: Italy condemns 'drone attack' on Gaza aid flotilla and deploys frigate
item.description: Italy's defence minister directs a navy vessel to assist the flotilla's boats after what he says was a drone attack by unidentified perpetrators off C...

item.title: Landmark deal paves way for cheaper HIV protection jab
item.description: The drug - a twice-yearly injection – reduces the current HIV treatment cost in developing countries.

item.title: Typhoon Ragasa makes landfall in China after 17 killed in Taiwan
item.description: Ragasa is the world's strongest storm this year and has been roaring over the South China Sea for days.

item.title: The professor who beat fraud allegations to become Malawi's president…again
item.description: The president-elect of the southern African nation has a long and controversial political career.
